mapper.select: select id, link, alias, status, (case when role then (select group_concat(r.role_code) from t_link_role_or_permission lrp inner join t_role r on lrp.role_id = r.id where lrp.link_id = lm.id and lrp.status = #{status} and r.status = #{status}) else (select group_concat(p.permission_code) from t_link_role_or_permission lrp inner join t_permission p on lrp.permission_id = p.id where lrp.link_id = lm.id and lrp.status = #{status} and p.status = #{status}) end) roleOrPermissionCodes, role, order_, all_, date_format(lm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_link_manage lm where lm.status = #{status}
